author: niallp
msg: IO-128 - currently file name "normalization" errors in the equals method causes a mis-leading NullPointerException. Adding a check for this and throwing an IllegalArgumentException with a better message should improve the user experience.

author: davi
msg: GDBM uses int type for the dsize field and APR uses size_t (unsigned
long), those structures (datum, apr_datum_t) might have different sizes
